about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, SVJ Enterprises Limited is engaged in the manufacturing of Disposable Paper Plates. Earlier, they were in the production and trading of honey. The company carry business in India and abroad for manufacturing, buying, supplying, importing, exporting and selling honey products, food product, grains etc.

The product portfolio of the company revolves around the manufacturing of:

  1. Disposable Silver Laminated Plates
  2. Aluminium Foil Food Container
  3. Aluminium Laminated Bags & Pouches
  4. Packaging Pouches

They have a well-equipped infrastructure to carry out all types of jobs tailor-made to customer requirements as per international standards. The company offers high-quality materials, scheduled delivery time, cost-effective products, efficient sales and services, and competitive prices at all times.

The promoters of the company are CA Suresh Jha and Mrs Veena Jha. They are the guiding force behind the success of the entity and offer their expertise such that the company thrives in every aspect.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Experienced management and skilled team.
  • Customer Centric Business Model.
  • Relationship with Suppliers.
  • Quality Assurance.

faqs.question: What is the SVJ Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer:
SVJ Enterprises IPO is a SME IPO of 1701000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on February 23, 2023, and closes on February 28, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in SVJ Enterprises IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in SVJ Enterprises IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in SVJ Enterprises IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in SVJ Enterprises IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'SVJ Enterprises IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When SVJ Enterprises IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The SVJ Enterprises IPO opens on February 23, 2023 and closes on February 28, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of SVJ Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: SVJ Enterprises IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for SVJ Enterprises IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in SVJ Enterprises IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is SVJ Enterprises IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for SVJ Enterprises IPO will be done on Friday, March 3, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, March 8, 2023. Check the SVJ Enterprises IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is SVJ Enterprises IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The SVJ Enterprises IPO listing date is on Thursday, March 9, 2023.
